price: 27. Wuxuu Muuse yidhi: Anigu Waxaan ka magan galay Rabbigay iyo Rabbigiinba mid kastoo islaweyn oo aan rumaysnayn Maalinta Xisaabta (Qiyaamada).
arabic: وَقَالَ مُوسَىٰٓ إِنِّي عُذۡتُ بِرَبِّي وَرَبِّكُم مِّن كُلِّ مُتَكَبِّرٖ لَّا يُؤۡمِنُ بِيَوۡمِ ٱلۡحِسَابِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waqāla mūsā innī ʿudh'tu birabbī warabbikum min kulli mutakabbirin lā yu'minu biyawmi al-ḥisābi
